creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: foreground scene at bottom with two men on horseback, with bows drawn, aiming at a pair of deer in LLC, with two fox-like animals in front of deer; other men on horseback--some with bows and arrows, rifles and spears--along winding path behind foremost two figures; white dog accompanying hunters on path above deer; procession of men with donkeys at left center; small group of men carrying boxes on poles led by a pointing man on horseback at right below center; procession of women--some with musical instruments--on horses, accompanied by several men with flags and bows and arrows, at right center; pair of flying cranes and another bird above trees at top right above procession of women; winding path through mountain landscape; some scattered trees; black lacquer frame with stepped feet
inscription: top center of right panel, in black: (untranslated inscription)
markings: below left line of inscription, in red: (two seals)
title: An Incident on the Hunt
